mapper.select:
SELECT fi.*, sps.`name` sps_name, spf.`name` spf_name, bcs.`name` bcs_name, bcs.phone bcs_phone, bcf.`name` bcf_name, bcf.phone bcf_phone FROM fa_invoice fi, sys_point sps, sys_point spf, bas_clientele bcs, bas_clientele bcf
fi.fa_point = spf.id AND fi.so_point = sps.id AND fi.fa_clientele = bcf.id AND fi.so_clientele = bcs.id and fi.collection_way = 1 and fi.id in ( ${ids} )
